participant_1.background:
I like to dye my hair blue because it's fun and bright.
i am a dog walker.
I'm always making delicious French fries for my family.
my father lives in china.
my passion is photography.

participant_2.background:
I am not tall, but my brother is.
I used to be a farmer, but I had to give up the farm to pursue my passion for teaching.
i was adopted.
my name is nick.
I used to go to the library a lot more often, but now I prefer to read books on my Kindle.

content.text: Hi there, I'm Nick, it's nice to meet you!
Hi Nick, nice to meet you too!
I see you're a teacher, what grade do you teach?
I teach kindergarten, it's a lot of fun!
That's awesome, I bet you have some great stories to share!
I do, I love hearing about all the different things my students do.
I'm sure they love hearing your stories too!
They do, I try to make learning as fun and engaging as possible.
That's great, I'm sure you're a great teacher!
So, what's your favorite thing to do outside of work?
I love reading, I used to go to the library all the time but now I mostly read on my Kindle.
I love reading too, I'm always looking for new books to read.
Me too, I'm currently reading The Great Gatsby.
I've heard good things about that book, I've been meaning to check it out.
It's really good, I'm enjoying it a lot.
I'm glad to hear that, I'll definitely have to check it out soon.
You should, I think you'd like it
